abouthero.title: Cześć! I'm Gosia
abouthero.description: Frontend Developer blending innovation with accessibility to create impactful web experiences.

items.title: React Solution Innovator
items.description: Building engaging, scalable web applications. Expertise in responsive design, modular UI development, and seamless content management.
points: Crafting cutting-edge web experiences with a focus on responsive, interactive designs tailored to client needs.
Developing accessible, multilingual sites with Sanity, ensuring content is dynamic, manageable, and reaches a global audience.
Leveraging Storybook for modular, consistent UI development, enhancing project efficiency and design coherence.

items.title: Inclusivity Engineer
items.description: Develop web applications that are accessible to all, including individuals with disabilities. Collaborating with visually impaired users and following WCAG standards, I aim to make digital platforms more inclusive, broadening your audience and enhancing user experience.

items.title: Pixel Perfect WordPress Developer
items.description: Transform unique visions into custom, editable WordPress themes, enhancing your web presence with engaging user experiences.

items.title: CASSINI Hackathon
items.description: Developed an AI-powered tool for cost estimation in construction, aiding anti-corruption efforts by improving transparency.

items.title: HackYeah
items.description: Created an AI-powered chatbot to guide students in making informed career decisions, leveraging NLP and machine learning technologies.

items.title: HackYeah
items.description: Developed a novel solution to facilitate composting, contributing to waste reduction and sustainable living practices.

items.title: Aquathon
items.description: Engineered an innovative solution to address the global water crisis, focusing on sustainable water management and conservation techniques.

description: Crafting seamless web experiences with a blend of innovative development and a passion for accessibility.
Actively engaged in hackathons and currently developing a transformative course on web accessibility.

work.title: Crafting digital excellence
work.description: Transforming ideas into impactful digital experiences through a meticulous development process.

steps.title: Discover
content: Beginning with an exhaustive design analysis, I engage in detailed discussions with the design team to fully understand the envisioned user experience, objectives, and technical requirements.
This critical first step ensures we're aligned from the start, setting a solid foundation for the seamless transformation of concepts into code.

steps.title: Define
content: Building on the insights gained, I architect the project's structure and draft a comprehensive development roadmap, carefully selecting technologies and methodologies that align perfectly with the project's goals.
This stage focuses on developing a robust strategy that ensures scalability, maintainability, and success.

steps.title: Develop
content: I turn designs into dynamic, functional code, maintaining open communication with the design team to accurately realize their vision, integrating continuous feedback to refine and enhance features.
This iterative approach ensures the seamless integration of interactive elements, surpassing the original design expectations.

steps.title: Refine
content: I apply a comprehensive testing protocol, from unit to acceptance testing, scrutinizing every application aspect for functionality and user satisfaction.
Through focused optimization, I enhance performance, accessibility, and ensure an exceptional user experience across all platforms.

steps.title: Deliver
content: I oversee the project's launch with an eye for detail, providing thorough documentation and training for stakeholders, ensuring a smooth transition.
Committed to excellence, I continually monitor, assess, and refine the application, leveraging user feedback and technological advances for ongoing improvement and innovation.

skillset.title: Skillset
skillset.description: Eager to embrace new challenges, I continuously evolve my skills to create accessible, efficient, and innovative web and mobile solutions.

skills.title: Frontend Mastery
skills.description: Advanced proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Next.js. Specialized in crafting responsive, dynamic user interfaces that exceed web standards.

skills.title: Accessibility Advocate
skills.description: Dedicated to ensuring web accessibility, rigorously applying WCAG guidelines to enhance inclusivity and usability across all projects.

skills.title: Agile Methodologies
skills.description: Proficient in Agile and Scrum methodologies, leveraging tools like Jira or Asana for peak efficiency in collaborative, fast-paced environments.

skills.title: Responsive Design
skills.description: Skilled in creating fluid and adaptable web designs using CSS, Sass, and modern CSS frameworks to ensure optimal viewing across devices.

skills.title: Design-Development Liaison
skills.description: Adept at fostering strong collaborations between design and development teams. Passionate about translating design concepts into technical solutions, ensuring seamless user experiences.

skills.title: State Management Expertise
skills.description: Proficient in managing complex state with React's Context and Hooks, ensuring seamless data flow and reactivity in large-scale applications.

skills.title: Performance Optimization
skills.description: Focused on optimizing web performance, leveraging tools and techniques like lazy loading, code splitting, and efficient rendering to enhance page speed and user experience.

skills.title: User Experience & Testing
skills.description: Committed to delivering outstanding user experiences through rigorous testing, employing Jest and user feedback to refine and perfect applications.

skills.title: Dedicated to Growth
skills.description: Passionate about professional development, engaging in ongoing learning through courses, hackathons, and developing accessible web content.
